item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Write Math Equations
item.description: Write math equations with ease. At first enable math:true in front matter. Then write this- $$ \varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887â€¦ $$ to produce this- $$ \varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.

item.title: Make Diagrams with Mermaid
item.description: Mermaid is an awesome software engineering diagramming tool. Write markdowns like this- graph TD A[Client] --> B[Load Balancer] B --> C[Server01] B --> D[Server02] to generate diagrams like this-

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
